steps.description: Examine the gradlew.bat file to determine if there are any Java source files or scripts being referenced or executed by this batch file.
Identify the location of the Java source files in the project where AWS SDK imports might be present.
steps.code:
set DIRNAME=%~dp0
if "%DIRNAME%" == "" set DIRNAME=.
set APP_BASE_NAME=%~n0
set APP_HOME=%DIRNAME%

steps.description: Refactor the AWS SDK imports to Azure SDK imports in the identified Java source files.
Update the groupId and artifactId of the AWS SDK dependency to the corresponding Azure SDK dependency.
Update the mainClass in the exec-maven-plugin configuration to an appropriate Azure SDK sample class.
Ensure any references to AWS-specific resources or configurations in other parts of the build or configuration are updated to Azure equivalents if applicable.
Locate and update all AWS SDK imports to use Azure Blob Storage SDK.
steps.code: Replace imports from com.amazonaws.* to com.azure.storage.blob.*

steps.description: Replace the AmazonS3 client instantiation with the Azure BlobServiceClient instantiation.
Remove code related to setting AWS region as Azure Blob Storage does not require this.
steps.code: Remove Region usWest2 = Region.getRegion(Regions.US_WEST_2); and s3.setRegion(usWest2);

steps.description: Update bucket creation logic to use Azure Blob Container creation.
Replace AWS S3 object upload logic with Azure Blob upload logic.
Replace AWS S3 object download logic with Azure Blob download logic.
steps.code: BlobClient blobClient = containerClient.getBlobClient(key); InputStream inputStream = blobClient.openInputStream(); displayTextInputStream(inputStream);

steps.description: Replace AWS S3 list objects logic with Azure Blob list blobs logic.
steps.code: for (BlobItem blobItem : containerClient.listBlobs(new ListBlobsOptions().setPrefix("My"), null)) { System.out.println(" - " + blobItem.getName() + "  "); }

steps.description: Replace AWS S3 delete object logic with Azure Blob delete blob logic.
Replace AWS S3 delete bucket logic with Azure Blob delete container logic.
